title: Work Equipment Heavy Duty Mechanic (Mechanic A)
description:
Diesel Engine Mechanic (HDM)
 
 At CN, we are committed to our pursuit of excellence. We take pride in delivering work of the highest standard, continually innovating to shape the railroad of the future. As responsible railroaders, we make the right decisions every time, putting safety first, acting with unwavering integrity, and holding ourselves accountable for our actions. We believe in succeeding together\\-by fostering inclusivity and collaboration, we sustainably deliver exceptional results for our customers.
 



 If you are a skilled trades person or interested in skilled trades and continuous learning in a safety\\-focused environment, working at CN could be a great fit for you. You'll be working on all types of equipment and structures designed to support the distribution of freight across North America. Enjoy paid training and evolve your skills. The careers we offer are meaningful because the work we do matters. Join us and get your career moving!   
 


   Job Summary
 
 The Heavy\\-Duty Mechanic (HDM) is responsible for performing inspections, major and minor repairs, overhauls and servicing on all types of locomotives.
 



  
 


 Working Conditions
 
          Ability to work irregular shifts, including nights, weekends, holidays, and occasional overtime.
 


* Shop environment.
* Occasional travel.



  
 


 Major Responsibilities
 
          Heavy Duty Mechanics (HDM) perform major and minor repairs, overhauls and servicing on all types of locomotives. To learn more about the job click here to view the video.
 



  
 



          Critical performance areas include the following but may vary depending on the location and circumstances:
 



  
 



          Inspect, service and maintain locomotives, in accordance with federal and company regulations, including changing oil or repairing, replacing, cleaning and adjusting parts.
   

  





          Diagnose diesel engine malfunctions and making required repairs.
 



  
 



          Assemble and start engines.
 



  
 



          Use electric and oxy\\-acetylene welding equipment, lubrication equipment and other vehicle repair tools and equipment, and operate said tools and machinery in a safe and effective manner.
 



  
 



          Prepare inspection, maintenance, and work reports, and record details on prescribed forms in accordance with established procedures.
 



  
 



          Operate locomotive on shop tracks.
 



  
 



          Test locomotives on shop track after repair.
 


   Requirements
 
          High School Diploma or General Educational Development (GED)
 


* Diesel mechanic experience and/or Diesel mechanic diploma.
* A valid driver's license.
* Using measuring devices and understanding visual displays.
* Basic technical knowledge of diesel mechanics.
* Good hand\\-eye coordination.
* Dedicated to getting the job done while meeting established standards of quality, safety, and client satisfaction.
* Frequent lifting / carrying up to 50 lbs. (22 kg).







 Assets
 
          Valid commercial driver's license for the class and type of equipment operated
 


* Ability to certify company equipment in accordance with provincial standards



          Experience troubleshooting hydraulic and electronic systems
 



  
 



          Welding skills
 


   What We Offer
 * Competitive Wages, Benefits, and Pension Plan
* Paid Training and Career Development
* Medical, vision, and dental insurance
* 24/7 Telemedicine Service
* Employee Share Investment Plan
* Educational Financial Assistance Program
* Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)
* Extensive Employee Discount Program
* Employee \\& Family Assistance Program (EFAP)








*This position is a unionized position, as such pay and benefits are governed by the applicable Collective Agreement.* 



   Paid Training:
 
 Successful candidates will receive on\\-the\\-job training, both theoretical and practical instructions. Depending on your level of experience, candidates may receive a 4\\-year on\\-the\\-job apprenticeship program and will attend a series of courses at your work location in Canada.
 



 Training will include locomotive components, locomotive control systems, locomotive air brakes, locomotive start up, basic diesel electric systems and CN maintenance regulations. Truck and traction motors, event recorders, as well as fuel, oil, water and air systems plus power assembly will also be covered. Successful completion of this program is essential for performance of future duties.
 



  
 



**Successful Candidate Process:** 



* Medical assessment (including drug, hearing, and vision).
* Criminal background check
* Offer Letter



  
 



**Paid Training Structure:** 



* 3 weeks at CN campus
* 2\\+ weeks in shop (on\\-the\\-job training)
* 3 weeks at CN campus



  
 


 About CN
 
 CN is a premium railroad that sustainably generates value for our customers, shareholders, employees, and stakeholders with an unwavering commitment to safety and service. Essential to the economy, to the customers, and to the communities it serves, CN safely transports more than 300 million tons of natural resources, manufactured products, and finished goods throughout North America every year. CN's network connects Canada's Eastern and Western coasts with the U.S. South through an 18,800\\-mile rail network. CN and its affiliates have been contributing to community prosperity and sustainable trade since 1919\\. CN powers the North American economy and is committed to programs supporting social responsibility and environmental stewardship.
 



*At CN, we are dedicated to building North America's
 **safest** 
 , most
 **inclusive,** 
 and
 **sustainable** 
 railroad, which includes reflecting the communities in which we operate. Research shows that candidates from underrepresented groups often don't apply unless they feel they fit the job posting at 100%. Even if you don't see yourself in every job requirement listed in a posting, we still encourage you to apply. If you require an accommodation for the recruitment process (including alternate formats of materials, accessible meeting rooms or other accommodations), please get in touch with our team at
 **cnrecruitment@cn.ca** 
 .* 




*As an equal employment opportunity employer, qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, and other protected status as required by applicable law.*

title: L2 Machine Learning Scientist
description:
As an organization at the forefront of autonomous driving, we have gathered vast amounts of valuable sensor data that provide a deep insight into various driving environments and scenarios. Within the AI Foundation Department our strategic response is to integrate foundational machine learning techniques to harness its full potential and drive its capabilities further ahead to adhere to future needs.
 



 Therefore, we are searching for a Deep Learning Specialist with Reinforcement Learning or Control Background deploying our next\\-generation modular and differentiable AV stack, bridging the gap between traditional model\\-based modularity and modern deep learning practices.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 
 :
 


* Design and deployment of our innovative modular and differentiable AV stack, focusing on prediction, planning, and control.
* Collaborate closely with our research and development teams, ensuring the seamless incorporation of model\\-based planning and control algorithms with advancements in differentiable optimization.
* Drive the continuous enhancement of our AV architectures, championing the harmony between modularity and end\\-to\\-end neural networks.
* Spearhead the evaluation process of our AV stack, ensuring marked improvements in both open\\-loop and closed\\-loop planning metrics.
* Advocate for and ensure the interpretability, reusability, and efficiency of our AV solutions, while maximizing the capabilities of deep learning and differentiable optimization.
* Stay abreast of the latest developments in differentiable optimization, ensuring our AV stack remains at the forefront of innovation.



**Qualifications** 
 :
 


* MS, or PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Robotics, or related fields with at least the years working experience or equivalent.
* Comprehensive understanding of modular AV system components combined with proficiency in end\\-to\\-end neural network designs.
* Hands\\-on experience with differentiable optimization and its applications in deep learning models.
* Demonstrable history of deploying neural network architectures for practical applications, with a preference for those within the autonomous vehicles domain.
* Expertise in Python and familiarity with major deep learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow.
* Exceptional analytical and problem\\-solving acumen, particularly in optimizing system performance and mitigating integration challenges.



**Bonus Points** 
 !
 


* Scholarly publications related to differentiable optimization, neural network architectures, or autonomous vehicle systems in high tier conferences as CVPR, ICCV, ICRA, IROS, NeurIPS ...
* Prior experience in developing or collaborating on AV stacks, especially in prediction, planning, and control sectors.
* Knowledge of contemporary strategies for testing and deploying deep learning models in real\\-world settings.

title: Senior Software Engineer (1-14A)
description:
Description de l'entreprise
   

  


 Notre client est une Insurtech innovante en pleine expansion, qui transforme le secteur de l’assurance grâce à des solutions basées sur l’intelligence artificielle et l’analyse prédictive.
 



 Grâce à une équipe expérimentée en R\\&D, produit et actuariat, elle a développé des algorithmes d’intelligence artificielle uniques permettant d’automatiser ces processus de manière révolutionnaire. Le résultat est une solution qui modélise les risques des assureurs 10 fois plus rapidement avec une précision accrue par rapport aux méthodes traditionnelles, tout en intégrant des fonctionnalités de provisionnement de nouvelle génération.
 



 L’entreprise a été reconnue dans plusieurs classements internationaux, tels que :
 


* **Top 50 des Insurtechs mondiales** 
  par CB Insights (2023\\)
* **Top 100 des solutions IA pour la finance** 
  par Fintech Global et Insurtech Global (2023\\)
* **N°24 dans le classement mondial des Insurtechs** 
  par Sønr (2022\\)



 Avec une équipe composée de 35 nationalités et des bureaux situés à Paris, Londres, New York, Tokyo, Milan, Cologne, Atlanta et Montréal, cette solution est résolument internationale.
 



 Elle dessert actuellement plus de 250 clients répartis sur 4 continents et cible principalement les marchés matures pour une expansion rapide.
 


 Description du poste
   

  


 Vous êtes un
 **ingénieur logiciel expérimenté** 
 et souhaitez rejoindre une équipe dynamique à l’échelle mondiale. Animé(e) par une approche centrée sur le client, vous contribuerez au développement de leur solution avancée de traitement des données.
 



**Tâches :** 



* Collaborer avec l’équipe pour concevoir, développer et améliorer un nouveau module de leur plateforme, en intervenant sur l’ensemble du stack technologique pour proposer des solutions web robustes et évolutives.
* Travailler en étroite collaboration avec les chefs de produit et les designers afin d’optimiser les fonctionnalités et les parcours utilisateurs, garantissant une expérience fluide et intuitive.
* Appliquer les meilleures pratiques en développement logiciel, notamment l’intégration et le déploiement continus (CI/CD) ainsi que des tests de qualité intégrés.
* Participer aux discussions techniques de l’équipe pour assurer l’alignement sur les objectifs produit et les implémentations techniques.
* Écrire un code propre, maintenable et bien documenté afin d’accompagner l’évolution de la plateforme.
* Être en contact direct avec leurs clients afin de garantir que les solutions développées dépassent leurs attentes.


 Qualifications
   

  


**Environnement technologique** 



* **Backend** 
 : Java 21 (Spring)
* **Frontend** 
 : Angular 18\\+ (TypeScript)
* **Autres technologies** 
 : Python, AWS, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker



**Profil recherché** 



* **4 ans d’expérience** 
 ou plus en développement logiciel.
* Motivation et enthousiasme à
 **mentorer** 
 les nouveaux talents et les ingénieurs juniors.
* Expérience en développement backend, idéalement avec
 **Java et Spring Boot** 
 (ou technologies similaires).
* Expérience en développement frontend, de préférence avec
 **TypeScript et Angular** 
 (ou un autre framework moderne équivalent).
* Connaissance des bonnes pratiques modernes en développement logiciel (
 **TDD, BDD, architecture hexagonale** 
 ).
* Expérience avec
 **AWS** 
 ou d’autres plateformes cloud.
* **Maîtrise de l’anglais à l’oral.**



  
 



**Atouts supplémentaires** 



* Intérêt ou expérience en
 **Machine Learning** 
 .
* Expérience approfondie avec
 **AWS** 
 .


  

  

 Informations complémentaires
   

  

* Salaire attractif \\+ bonus annuel
* Assurance santé, dentaire et vision
* Plan d’épargne retraite
* Politique de congés généreuse
* Indemnités de transport
* Abonnement à une salle de sport via ClassPass
* Allocation pour l’équipement informatique
* ✅
 **Des avantages supplémentaires**
* Onboarding dans nos bureaux à Paris
* Opportunités de formation et développement professionnel
* Moments d’équipe : événements réguliers et rassemblements d’entreprise
* Goodies et surprises pour rendre l’expérience encore plus agréable !

title: Software Developer – Workforce Planning
description:
**About Nakisa** 
  

  

 Nakisa stands as a global leader in enterprise business solutions, specializing in Human Resources, Financial Management, and Real Estate. We are dedicated to delivering innovative, forward\\-thinking, and robust software solutions that propel business strategies forward. Trusted by numerous Fortune 1000 companies, our top\\-of\\-the\\-line solutions have consistently excelled in the market, underscoring our commitment to providing our clients with unparalleled experience.
 



 Our team represents a rich tapestry of cultural and religious backgrounds, making diversity our greatest asset. Unified by our values of Fairness, Integrity, Service, and Humility, we foster an environment where unity and teamwork are our core strengths. At Nakisa, we continuously strive to ensure that these values guide our actions at every level.
 



 As a company, we are in a phase of dynamic growth and prosperity, offering ample opportunities for those who join us on this journey to develop and thrive alongside us. If you are seeking a workplace where your contributions are valued and where you can actively participate in our pursuit of excellence, Nakisa welcomes you with open arms.
 



 We're recognized as one of the best Canadian employers, having been named one of Montreal's top employers, as well as
 **one of Canada's best employers** 
 for recent graduates.
 



 Our people and our culture are the key to our success. If you're looking for a workplace that embraces a hybrid work model, values your contributions, and encourages active participation in our pursuit of excellence, Nakisa warmly invites you to join us.
 




**About the Role** 




 As a Software Developer on our Workforce Planning (WFP) team, you will play a pivotal role in designing and implementing scalable, cloud\\-native Java applications. Collaborating within an Agile environment, you'll contribute to developing innovative solutions that enhance our workforce planning capabilities. Your expertise will drive the evolution of our software products, ensuring they meet the highest standards of performance and reliability.
 







**Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and maintain backend services with Java, Spring Boot, and Hibernate, along with their corresponding frontend components using Vue.js and Quasar.


* Design and optimize APIs, database schemas, and system architectures.


* Collaborate with Product, QA, and DevOps teams to deliver high\\-quality software.


* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code that follows best practices.


* Participate in code reviews, design discussions, and technical decision\\-making.


* Take ownership of assigned components, ensuring performance, scalability, and reliability.


* Continuously explore and implement new technologies and best practices.







**Qualifications** 



* Minimum of 2 years of full\\-stack software development experience, including 1\\+ years of Java development.


* Strong understanding of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) and design patterns.


* Experience with frontend technologies such as Vue.js, Angular, or React.js.


* Experience working in Agile and Test\\-Driven Development (TDD) environments.


* Proficiency with SQL, MySQL, and ORM frameworks (Hibernate, JPA).


* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent practical experience.


* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and in a team


* Strong communication and collaboration skills.







**Nice\\-to\\-have** 



* Experience with Java 17\\+ and Spring Boot.


* Proficiency in DevOps tools like Docker, Jenkins, and Git.


* Knowledge of cloud computing environments (AWS, Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.







**Why Join Us?** 



* Work on cutting\\-edge cloud\\-native applications as part of a dynamic and forward\\-thinking team.


* Be part of a company that values continuous learning, innovation, and professional growth.


* Contribute to projects that directly impact enterprise workforce planning and operational efficiency.












 We are excited to see how you can contribute to Nakisa's continued success and innovation. If you are passionate about making a difference and ready to take on new challenges, we invite you to apply for this role. At Nakisa, we believe in fostering a supportive and engaging work environment where every team member can thrive and grow. Apply now to join our team and help shape the future of enterprise business solutions.
 



 We look forward to reviewing your application and getting to know you better.

title: Senior Digital Design Engineer
company: MRL Consulting Group - the semiconductor recruitment company
description:
Are you ready to shape the future of ultra\\-low\\-power wireless technology? We’re hiring a
 **Senior Digital ASIC Design Engineer** 
 to lead the design and implementation of cutting\\-edge wireless ASICs and SoCs. If you have a passion for innovation and a track record of delivering high\\-performance digital circuits, this role is for you.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As a
 **Senior Digital ASIC Design Engineer** 
 , you will take ownership of critical design blocks within complex
 **Application\\-Specific Integrated Circuits (ASICs)** 
 , contributing to groundbreaking applications in
 **IoT, audio, wireless peripherals, and proximity detection** 
 . You’ll work closely with cross\\-functional teams to ensure the
 **functionality, efficiency, and performance** 
 of next\\-generation wireless solutions.
 



 This role offers the chance to work in a
 **fast\\-growing, dynamic** 
 environment where your expertise will directly impact the development of cutting\\-edge wireless technologies.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Define the
 **overall ASIC architecture** 
 , optimizing performance, power, and area constraints.
* Develop
 **high\\-quality RTL code** 
 (Verilog, SystemVerilog, or VHDL) for digital circuits.
* Conduct
 **synthesis, static timing analysis (STA), and power optimization** 
 to enhance chip performance.
* Work closely with
 **verification and physical design teams** 
 to validate functionality and resolve issues.
* Implement
 **power\\-aware design techniques** 
 to optimize energy efficiency.
* Provide
 **technical leadership and mentorship** 
 to junior team members.
* Participate in
 **design reviews** 
 and contribute to the validation of ASICs in the lab.
* Collaborate on
 **testability strategies** 
 to ensure seamless post\\-silicon validation.



  





**What We’re Looking For** 



* **10\\+ years** 
 of experience in
 **digital ASIC design** 
 , with
 **5\\+ years** 
 in a
 **senior role** 
 .
* **Bachelor’s or Master’s degree** 
 in Electrical Engineering or equivalent.
* Strong expertise in
 **digital logic design** 
 , state machines, and clock domain crossing.
* Proficiency in
 **RTL coding (Verilog, SystemVerilog, or VHDL)** 
 and advanced synthesis techniques.
* Experience with
 **EDA tools** 
 for digital simulation, synthesis, and static timing analysis.
* Strong debugging and problem\\-solving skills, with lab experience in ASIC validation.
* **Familiarity with AMBA bus interconnects** 
 and scripting in
 **Python** 
 .
* Excellent
 **communication and collaboration** 
 skills in a team\\-oriented environment.



  





**Nice\\-to\\-Haves** 



* Experience with
 **microcontroller (MCU) integration** 
 .
* Knowledge of
 **Design\\-for\\-Testability (DFT)** 
 methodologies.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* **Make an Impact:** 
 Work in a
 **growing start\\-up** 
 where your contributions matter.
* **Exciting Challenges:** 
 Collaborate with a
 **passionate and creative team** 
 on cutting\\-edge technologies.
* **Work\\-Life Balance:** 
 Flexible hours and remote work options.
* **Career Growth:** 
 Opportunities for professional development and leadership.
* **Competitive Benefits:**
* Comprehensive
 **group insurance** 
 from day one.
* **Employee stock option plan** 
 .
* **Extra paid time off** 
 beyond vacation, sick leave, and holidays.
* Engaging
 **social events, team activities, and learning sessions** 
 .



  





 If you’re excited to push the boundaries of
 **wireless ASIC design** 
 , we’d love to hear from you. Apply today and become part of an innovative team shaping the future of connectivity, today.

title: Sr Analyst, Actuarial
description:
Reporting to the Personal Insurance Modelling \\& Pricing Analytics Manager, your responsibilities include contributions to modelling projects using state of the art machine learning techniques, innovative approaches as well as the coaching and mentoring of junior analysts. This role is at the intersection of data science and actuarial ratemaking, you will work collaboratively with the rating teams to ensure our continued success. Projects are varied and include the creation of loss cost, demand and market premium models, continuous improvement of our tools and processes, identifying actionable insights through data analysis to improve our mix of business. In this role, you will have exposure to the entire model lifecycle for multiple lines of business, with valuable project leadership opportunities, exposure to higher management and career development potential.
 



**What can you expect in this role?** 



* Lead the creation and refresh of predictive models
* Participate in elaborating solutions for current and emerging business problems
* Engage with internal and external stakeholders
* Identify opportunities for process efficiencies within the modelling space
* Develop and apply your experience with database and predictive modeling to build models that inform strategic decision\\-making processes
* Independently respond to routine requests of internal and external stakeholders related to standard reports and processes.
* Effectively manage timelines for independent projects and analysis
* Communicate actuarial concepts and make recommendations to management both verbally and in writing with supporting documentation
* Measure, track, and monitor the performance of our predictive models
* Perform peer reviews on the technical and qualitative analysis of peers



**What do you bring to the role?** 



* University degree in a quantitative discipline such as: programs: Actuarial Sciences, Mathematics, Statistics
* Completion of at least 4 exams of the Casualty Actuarial Society
* 3 or more years of relevant full\\-time experience
* Experience in different programming languages such as Python and R, and proficient in SQL. Familiarity with the Google Cloud Platform is an asset.
* Understanding of machine learning concepts and popular algorithms such as GLM, GAM, XGBoost.
* Strong communication skills with the capacity to communicate complex technical concepts to diverse audiences
* Have the drive to innovate, and challenge the status quo
* Excels both in collaborative environments and when working autonomously



**Salary Range:** 
 $76,100 \\- $146,000
 



 Definity is the parent company to some of Canada's most long\\-standing and innovative insurance brands, including Economical Insurance, Sonnet Insurance, Family Insurance Solutions, and Petline Insurance. Our ambition is to be one of Canada's leading and most innovative property and casualty insurers. We can't do that without our people, so we embrace and encourage a culture that's collaborative, ambitious, rewarding, and empowering. 
 



  



 We offer a flexible, hybrid work experience where employees work from the office and virtually depending on the type of work they are doing and who they are working with. Bring your true self and be a part of our journey. It's better here. 
 





**Interested in this role, but don't meet every requirement?** 
 We encourage you to apply! We know from experience that a candidate doesn't need 100% of the qualifications listed to bring incredible value to our team. We're actively seeking diverse backgrounds and perspectives to help us make insurance better. At Definity, inclusion, diversity, and equity aren't just "nice to have" \\- they're essential to our success. 
 



**What's in it for you?** 



* Hybrid work schedule for most roles
* Company share ownership program
* Pension and savings programs, with company\\-matched RRSP contributions
* Paid volunteer days and company matching on charitable donations
* Educational resources, tuition assistance, and paid time off to study for exams
* Focus on inclusion with employee groups, support for gender affirmation surgery, access to BIPOC counsellors, access to programs for working parents
* Wellness and recognition programs
* Discounts on products and services



 Actual salary for the role may vary depending on work location of the successful candidate and other factors including but not limited to, skills, education, experience, working conditions and the local labour market. In addition to base pay, eligible employees may participate in various incentive plans which are paid out at the discretion of the company and subject to individual and company performance.
 



**Go ahead and expect a lot \\- you deserve it.** 




 It's better here \\- but don't take our word for it. Definity was named by Great Place to Work as one of the Best Workplaces in Canada for women, for youth, and for inclusion.
 



 Our inclusive work environment welcomes diversity and supports accessibility. If you require accommodation at any time during the recruitment process, please let us know by contacting accessibility@definity.com.
 



**Background checks** 




 This role requires successful clearance of background checks (including criminal checks and leadership references).
 







 \\#LI\\-Hybrid

title: Applied Machine Learning Scientist I, AI/ML Model Validation
description:
**Work Location:** 



 Toronto, Ontario, Canada
 




**Hours:** 



 37\\.5
 




**Line of Business:** 



 Analytics, Insights, \\& Artificial Intelligence
 




**Pay Details:** 



 $105,500 \\- $125,000 CAD
 







 The pay details posted reflect a temporary market premium specific to this role that is reassessed annually.
 




 TD is committed to providing fair and equitable compensation opportunities to all colleagues. Growth opportunities and skill development are defining features of the colleague experience at TD. Our compensation policies and practices have been designed to allow colleagues to progress through the salary range over time as they progress in their role. The base pay actually offered may vary based upon the candidate's skills and experience, job\\-related knowledge, geographic location, and other specific business and organizational needs.
 







 As a candidate, you are encouraged to ask compensation related questions and have an open dialogue with your recruiter who can provide you more specific details for this role.
 







**:** 




***Department Overview***




 TD Model Validation (MV) group is responsible for the independent validation and approval of analytical models used for credit, fraud/AML (anti\\-money laundering), NLP, pricing, hedging, insurance, capital evaluations, and marketing. The Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) MV team is responsible for the validation of all AI/ML models used across the Bank for various use cases.
 







***Job Description***








 The position reports to Senior Applied Machine Learning Scientist in the AI/ML Model Validation team. Detailed accountabilities include:
 


* Validate (review, test, and provide effective challenge) AI/ML models.
* Stay up to date with advancements in the field of AI/ML including major publications, evaluation metrics, technology stacks, and libraries.
* Maintain full professional knowledge of techniques and developments in the field of AI/ML and share knowledge with business partners and senior management.
* Develop/implement AI/ML model validation methodologies and standards. Ensure that the validation methodologies and standards are in line with industry best practices or address regulatory and audit requirements.
* Develop and apply a variety of statistical tests and modeling techniques to identify/recommend improvements to models and undertake related initiatives. Implement benchmark models as applicable.
* Communicate findings and recommendations to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.







 The position involves working effectively with different internal partners suchas AI2, FCRM, RMD, P\\&Tetc.
 







***Job Requirements***







* Strong quantitative skills with an advanced degree in one or more of the following areas: computer science, engineering, machine learning, statistics, mathematics, physics, or actuarial science.
* Proven experience as a Machine Leaning Scientist, Data Scientist or a similar role.
* Experience with and strong knowledge of AI/ML methodologies including Bagging/Boosting methods, Deep Learning, Generative AI, modern Natural Language Processing (NLP), Transformers, Diffusion models, and Generalized Additive models.
* Experience with Deep Learning and Generative AI technology stacks such as PyTorch, Tensorflow/Keras, LangChain, HuggingFace, etc.
* Motivated to stay up to date with the latest advancements in machine learning, and cloud technologies.
* Proficient in one or more scripting/programming languages such as Python, PySpark, Scala, etc.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure DataBricks, Azure ML Studio) and big data technologies (e.g., PySpark, Hadoop).
* Familiarity with principles of Object Oriented Programming (OOP).
* Knowledge of machine learning explain\\-ability/interpretability algorithms.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills (position requires writing clean technical reports).
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\\-paced, dynamic environment. Good time management and multitasking skills with minimal supervision.







***Preferred Qualifications***



* Ability to implement AI/ML algorithms from academic research papers is a plus.
* Experience with distributed computing and parallel processing using Spark.
* Knowledge of SQL and database systems.







**Who We Are:** 




 TD is one of the world's leading global financial institutions and is the fifth largest bank in North America by branches/stores. Every day, we deliver legendary customer experiences to over 27 million households and businesses in Canada, the United States and around the world. More than 95,000 TD colleagues bring their skills, talent, and creativity to the Bank, those we serve, and the economies we support. We are guided by our vision to Be the Better Bank and our purpose to enrich the lives of our customers, communities and colleagues.
 







 TD is deeply committed to being a leader in customer experience, that is why we believe that all colleagues, no matter where they work, are customer facing. As we build our business and deliver on our strategy, we are innovating to enhance the customer experience and build capabilities to shape the future of banking. Whether you've got years of banking experience or are just starting your career in financial services, we can help you realize your potential. Through regular leadership and development conversations to mentorship and training programs, we're here to support you towards your goals. As an organization, we keep growing \\- and so will you.
 















**Our Total Rewards Package** 
  

 Our Total Rewards package reflects the investments we make in our colleagues to help them and their families achieve their financial, physical, and mental well\\-being goals. Total Rewards at TD includes a base salary, variable compensation, and several other key plans such as health and well\\-being benefits, savings and retirement programs, paid time off, banking benefits and discounts, career development, and reward and recognition programs. Learn more
 







**Additional Information:** 
  

 We're delighted that you're considering building a career with TD. Through regular development conversations, training programs, and a competitive benefits plan, we're committed to providing the support our colleagues need to thrive both at work and at home.
 







 Please be advised that this job opportunity is subject to provincial regulation for employment purposes. It is imperative to acknowledge that each province or territory within the jurisdiction of Canada may have its own set of regulations, requirements.
 



  

**Colleague Development** 
  

 If you're interested in a specific career path or are looking to build certain skills, we want to help you succeed. You'll have regular career, development, and performance conversations with your manager, as well as access to an online learning platform and a variety of mentoring programs to help you unlock future opportunities. Whether you have a passion for helping customers and want to expand your experience, or you want to coach and inspire your colleagues, there are many different career paths within our organization at TD \\- and we're committed to helping you identify opportunities that support your goals.
   





**Training \\& Onboarding** 
  

 We will provide training and onboarding sessions to ensure that you've got everything you need to succeed in your new role.
 







**Interview Process** 
  

 We'll reach out to candidates of interest to schedule an interview. We do our best to communicate outcomes to all applicants by email or phone call.
 



  

**Accommodation** 
  

 Your accessibility is important to us. Please let us know if you'd like accommodations (including accessible meeting rooms, captioning for virtual interviews, etc.) to help us remove barriers so that you can participate throughout the interview process.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
 







**Language Requirement (Quebec only):** 



 Maitrise d'une langue autre que le francais pour offrir du soutien ou traiter avec des employes ou des collegues qui ont besoin de services et de soutien dans une langue autre que le francais.

title: Data Solutions Engineer
description:
**we offer more than a job, we offer a career!** 




  
 


* We support our employees to shape their career by encouraging continuing education and investing in training and development.
* We put our employees at the center of what we do to allow them to grow personally and professionally, with projects and challenges that are motivating and rewarding.
* We inspire people to do what they are passionate about by believing in integrity, respect and recognition of diversity and community support.
* We are a dynamic team where entrepreneurship, innovation and collaboration are at the core of our values.
* We offer competitive salaries and a multitude of benefits starting day one including generous medical and dental coverage, telemedicine, employee and family assistance program, and retirement and savings programs.
* We recognize the importance of work\\-life balance with our hybrid work program, wellness allowance, and year\\-round social activities and events.








**We are looking for a Data Solutions Engineer to join our Business Intelligence team in our Montreal office!** 




  
 



 As a Data Solutions Engineer, you will work with a dedicated team whose goal is to leverage data and provide autonomy, enabling them to make sound data\\-driven decisions.
 



  
 



 If you are career\\-minded and looking for a dynamic work environment with a growth mindset, you will love working among our team!
 



  
 



**Your day as a Data Solutions Engineer** 




  
 


* Start and develop this data science endeavor with the support of the current BI team.
* Identify potential opportunities where data science initiatives can help the business.
* Gathering data from various sources, such as databases, APIs, and websites.
* Understand structure of enterprise data, while undertaking data cleaning .
* Using statistical methods and machine learning to analyze data.
* Creating, validating, testing, and updating various algorithms and models.
* Making recommendations to stakeholders based on data analysis.
* Part of your role will be to build \\& maintain Power BI reports \\& dashboards.
* Work with Physical and Logical Data Marts in Azure Synapse and SQL Server.
* Work in Agile framework/methodology.








**Our ideal candidate** 








* Bachelor’s degree and master’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, Statistics, Mathematics or other related field, with BI/Data science projects undertaken at university level.
* 2\\+ years of experience working in growing organizational BI.
* Actual experience in data science applications in corporate environment is an asset.
* Fundamental knowledge of BI related concepts is expected.
* Familiarity working with or projects undertaken using various reporting tools like Power BI, Tableau, etc.
* Knowledge of Data Lakes, Data warehousing, Data Mart concepts an asset.
* Knowledge of Data Modelling, Data Transformation \\& database normalization concepts an asset.
* Familiarity with Azure Synapse, Data Factory, Data Lake, SQL Data Warehouse an asset.
* Willingness to be on top of new technological advances in ML \\& Data science.
* Bilingual with strong verbal and written communication skills in both French and English, as the candidate will be required to interact in English with stakeholders (colleagues and clients) outside Quebec.
* Passion for data \\& driving actionable insights from it.
* Strong problem\\-solving and logical reasoning skills.
* Attention to details and data validation skills.
* Reliable, flexible \\& dedicated.
* Team Player with excellent communication skills.
* Professionalism a must (Meet deadlines, double check the deliverable, etc.).



  
 



**Who we are** 




  
 



 Founded in 1987 by Barry F. Lorenzetti, BFL CANADA is one of the largest employee\\-owned and operated Risk Management, Insurance Brokerage, and Employee Benefits consulting services firms in North America. The firm has a team of 1,400 professionals located in 27 offices across the country. Our employees have free rein to demonstrate their creativity, leadership, and entrepreneurial skills since we believe in each one of them. BFL CANADA is a founding Partner of Lockton Global LLP, a partnership of independent insurance brokers who provide Risk Management, Insurance, and Benefits Consulting services in over 140 countries around the world.
 



 Our Montreal office is located at the heart of downtown Montreal, the largest city in Quebec. Our employees can benefit from the numerous exciting activities organized in the neighborhood.
 



 Let’s stay in touch: Follow us on LinkedIn to get privileged access to our activities and see our other job opportunities.
 



 Visit our website to learn more about us: bflcanada.ca
 



 BFL CANADA is an equal\\-opportunity employer.  We welcome and encourage applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.
 



 Offers of employment at BFL CANADA are conditional upon satisfactory results of background verifications.

 L'objectif est d'attirer, engager et convertir des conseillers financiers independants de haut niveau a grande echelle.
 



 Ce role exige une expertise en automatisation marketing via l'IA, analytique predictive et acquisition digitale, afin d'optimiser en continu les performances et d'accelerer le recrutement des conseillers.
 



 Le specialiste travaillera sous la gestion de la Directrice Communications et Marketing, en collaboration etroite avec l'equipe de Developpement des Affaires et la Specialiste en Marketing Digital, pour aligner les strategies d'acquisition avec les objectifs commerciaux.
 











 Ce que vous ferez
 







 1\\. Acquisition et generation de leads avec IA
 


* Concevoir et executer des campagnes d'acquisition multicanales pilotees par l'IA, integrant des modeles de machine learning pour affiner le ciblage et l'engagement.
* Exploiter l'analytique predictive et l'Intelligence artificielle (outils et autres) pour segmenter, identifier et hierarchiser les prospects a fort potentiel.
* Optimiser les chatbots conversationnels et l'automatisation des emails avec NLP pour accelerer la qualification des leads et reduire le cycle de conversion.
* Deployer des strategies ABM augmentees par l'IA pour une approche ultra\\-personnalisee des prospects.
* Utiliser des plateformes publicitaires IA (Google AI Ads, Meta, LinkedIn AI Targeting) pour maximiser les conversions et reduire le cout d'acquisition.
* Exploiter l'analytique predictive et l'Intelligence artificielle (outils et autres) pour segmenter, identifier et hierarchiser les prospects a fort potentiel.



 2\\. Automatisation \\& Optimisation CRM
 


* Collaborer avec la Specialiste du marketing digital et CRM Manager pour mettre en place une automatisation marketing basee sur l'IA (HubSpot ou autres outils necessaires), afin d'optimiser et de personnaliser les campagnes de recrutement de conseillers.
* Travailler en etroite collaboration pour integrer le scoring predictif des leads et le suivi comportemental au sein de HubSpot, en garantissant l'alignement avec les structures de donnees existantes et les workflows marketing.
* S'associer avec la Specialiste du marketing digital et CRM Manager pour developper des workflows adaptatifs bases sur l'IA, optimisant les sequences d'e\\-mails, les relances et le retargeting en fonction des signaux d'engagement en temps reel.
* Soutenir les initiatives marketing et de developpement d'affaires en deployant des outils d'aide a la vente alimentes par l'IA, facilitant la collaboration inter\\-equipes tout en s'alignant sur les strategies CRM et d'automatisation existantes.
* Developper des workflows IA adaptatifs, ajustant automatiquement les sequences d'emails, relances et reciblages selon les signaux d'engagement en temps reel.
* Mettre en place des outils d'aide a la vente pour ameliorer la collaboration entre marketing et developpement des affaires.



 3\\. Optimisation des performances et analytique de croissance
 


* Construire et affiner des tableaux de bord pour suivre les KPIs du recrutement : taux de conversion, engagement des prospects, prevision de valeur client.
* Exploiter des modeles de ''deep learning'' pour automatiser les tests A/B et optimiser les campagnes.
* Utiliser des ''heatmaps'' IA et analyses comportementales pour ameliorer l'experience utilisateur et maximiser les taux de conversion.
* Affiner les strategies marketing via des algorithmes d'apprentissage par renforcement, s'adaptant aux tendances historiques et aux comportements des prospects.



 4\\. Marque employeur et strategie de contenu pilotee par l'IA
 


* Creer du contenu dynamique genere par IA (pages d'atterrissages adaptatives, videos personnalisees, emails augmentes par NLP) pour maximiser l'engagement.
* Optimiser les campagnes LinkedIn et digitales via des recommandations IA en temps reel, renforcant le positionnement de la marque.
* Automatiser la production de contenus (articles, etudes de cas, temoignages) avec des outils de generation IA.
* Dynamiser les webinaires de recrutement avec des chatbots interactifs IA et analyses d'audience en temps reel.



 5\\. Collaboration et alignement strategiqueA
 


* Travailler avec l'equipe Developpement des affaires pour assurer l'alignement des strategies marketing IA avec les priorites de recrutement.
* Collaborer avec l'equipe de communication et de marketing pour integrer l'IA aux strategies existantes.
* Identifier et exploiter des partenariats strategiques IA pour accelerer l'acquisition de conseillers.







 Ce que nous recherchons
 


* Excellente maitrise du francais et de l'anglais, a l'oral comme a l'ecrit
* Experience averee en croissance marketing, generation de leads et automatisation, IA, idealement en services financiers, fintech ou B2B SaaS.
* Maitrise des outils d'automatisation marketing pilotes par IA (HubSpot, etc.).
* Expertise en modeles de machine learning appliques a l'analytique predictive, au scoring des leads et a la segmentation client.
* Connaissance approfondie des IA conversationnelles, NLP et integration chatbot.
* Solide experience en publicite digitale IA (Google Ads AI, LinkedIn Predictive Audiences, Meta AI).
* Competence en analyse de donnees et business intelligence (Google BigQuery, Looker, tableaux de bord IA).
* Capacite a automatiser et optimiser les tunnels d'acquisition via des strategies IA de personnalisation avancee.
* Excellentes competences analytiques et capacite a deployer des strategies a fort impact sous pression.
* Experience en marketing financier, gestion de patrimoine ou recrutement de conseillers.
* Connaissance des segmentations comportementales et recommandation IA.
* Experience en ABM assiste par IA pour des campagnes ultra\\-ciblees.
* Maitrise des outils de generation IA (ChatGPT, Jasper, Copy.ai) pour l'automatisation du contenu.







 Ce que nous offrons
 


* Poste permanent a temps plein (37\\.5h/semaine)
* Bureaux modernes avec vue, en plein cur du centre\\-ville de Montreal, facilement accessible en transports en commun
* Mode de travail hybride : 3 jours au bureau et 2 jours en teletravail
* 3 semaines de vacances et 5 journees maladies par annee
* Apres la periode de probation : Assurances collectives completes (maladie, dentaire, compte gestion sante, programme d'aide aux employes, telemedecine) prises en charge a 50% par l'employeur
* Apres la periode de probation : Programme de REER avec participation de l'employeur
* Prise en charge de 20% de la carte OPUS par l'employeur (equivalent a 2 mois gratuits par an)
* Implication dans la communaute et la cause corporative contre le cancer et autres associations
* Organisation frequente d'evenements par le comite social, bases sur l'evenementiel, la sante mentale et physique des employes et l'implication sociale et communautaire
* Encouragement au developpement personnel a travers la formation et l'evolution interne
* Remboursement de l'abonnement sportif a hauteur de 300$ par annee
* Acces gratuit a la salle de gym de l'immeuble







 A propos de PEAK
 



 Notre objectif est de faire une reelle difference dans la vie des Canadiens. Notre mission est d'ameliorer la qualite de vie des gens grace a une meilleure utilisation de leur argent.
 



 PEAK est le chef de file canadien du conseil entierement independant.
 



 Depuis sa fondation en 1992, PEAK n'a cesse d'elargir ses horizons et compte maintenant plus de 16 milliards de dollars d'actifs sous administration. Avec 1 500 conseillers, professionnels inscrits et employes a travers le Canada, PEAKa maintenu sa position de leader, mais n'a jamais perdu de vue ses valeurs et sa mission.
 







 Nous souhaitons remercier tous ceux et celles qui nous feront parvenir leur candidature, mais nous ne communiquerons qu'avec les candidats retenus pour une entrevue.
 







 \\*\\*\\*\\*\\*\\*
 







 AI\\-Driven Growth \\& Lead Generation \\& Automation Specialist
 







 At PEAK, we value a culture based on trust and strive to maintain a collaborative environment and a friendly atmosphere among our employees. We offer a dynamic working environment with stimulating challenges that will enable you to reach your full potential. Our values are people, independence, innovation and integrity.
 







*Are you an AI\\-driven marketing expert with a passion for digital acquisition, automation and performance? This position is for you!* 








 About the position
 







 We are looking for an AI\\-driven Growth Marketing, Lead Generation \\& Automation Specialist to design and implement intelligent, data\\-driven marketing systems that attract, engage, and convert top\\-tier independent financial advisors at scale. This role requires expertise in AI\\-powered automation, predictive analytics, and digital lead generation to drive continuous optimization and accelerate advisor acquisition.
 



 The specialist will report to the Marketing Director and collaborate closely with the Business Development team and the Digital marketing Specialist to ensure that AI\\-driven marketing solutions seamlessly support the firm's recruitment efforts.
 







 What you will do
 







 1\\. AI\\-Powered Lead Generation \\& Advisor Recruitment
 


* Design and execute multi\\-channel AI\\-driven lead generation campaigns, integrating machine learning models to optimize targeting and engagement.
* Leverage predictive analytics and artificial intelligence (tools and others) to segment, identify, and prioritize high\\-potential prospects
* Optimize conversational AI chatbots and NLP\\-powered email automation to enhance lead qualification and accelerate recruitment.
* Develop account\\-based marketing (ABM) strategies leveraging AI for hyper\\-personalized outreach and engagement.
* Utilize AI\\-powered advertising platforms (Google AI Ads, Meta, LinkedIn AI targeting) to improve conversion rates and reduce acquisition costs.
* Leverage predictive analytics and artificial intelligence (tools and other resources) to segment, identify, and prioritize high\\-potential prospects.



 2\\. Automation \\& CRM Optimization
 


* Collaborate with the Internal Digital Marketer and CRM Manager to implement AI\\-driven marketing automation (HubSpot or other necessary tools) that streamlines and personalizes advisor recruitment campaigns.
* Work closely to integrate predictive lead scoring and behavioral tracking within HubSpot, ensuring alignment with existing data structures and marketing workflows.
* Partner with the Internal Digital Marketer and CRM Manager to build adaptive AI workflows that optimize email sequences, follow\\-ups, and retargeting based on real\\-time engagement signals.
* Support marketing and business development efforts by deploying AI\\-powered sales enablement tools that enhance cross\\-team collaboration while aligning with existing CRM and automation strategies.
* Build adaptive AI workflows that optimize email sequences, follow\\-ups, and retargeting based on real\\-time engagement signals.
* Deploy intelligent AI\\-powered sales enablement tools to enhance collaboration between marketing and business development teams.



 3\\. Performance Optimization \\& Growth Analytics
 


* Develop and refine AI\\-powered analytics dashboards to track recruitment KPIs, including conversion probabilities, engagement patterns, and lifetime advisor value predictions.
* Leverage deep learning models for A/B testing automation and continuous campaign optimization.
* Utilize AI\\-driven heatmaps and behavioral insights to enhance user experience and improve conversion funnel efficiency.
* Optimize campaigns with reinforcement learning algorithms, adapting marketing strategies based on historical performance and evolving advisor behaviors.



 4\\. AI\\-Powered Branding \\& Content Strategy
 


* Develop AI\\-generated dynamic content (adaptive landing pages, personalized video messaging, NLP\\-enhanced email sequences) to increase prospect engagement.
* Optimize LinkedIn and digital campaigns using predictive AI content recommendations to boost brand positioning and credibility.
* Implement generative AI tools to automate content creation, including blog articles, case studies, and thought leadership pieces.
* Enhance advisor recruitment webinars with AI\\-powered interactive Q\\&A bots and real\\-time audience analytics.



 5\\. Collaboration \\& Cross\\-Team Alignment
 


* Work closely with Business Development to align AI\\-driven marketing initiatives with sales priorities and advisor recruitment goals.
* Partner with the Digital Marketing \\& Communications teams to integrate AI capabilities into existing marketing strategies.
* Identify and leverage strategic AI partnerships to enhance advisor acquisition efforts.



 What we are looking for
 


* Excellent command of spoken and written French and English.
* Proven track record in AI\\-powered growth marketing, automation, and lead generation, ideally in financial services, fintech, or B2B SaaS.
* Expertise in AI\\-driven marketing automation tools (HubSpot).
* Experience with machine learning models for predictive analytics, lead scoring, and customer segmentation.
* Deep understanding of conversational AI, NLP automation, and chatbot integration.
* Strong performance marketing skills, including AI\\-optimized advertising (Google Ads AI, LinkedIn Predictive Audiences, Meta).
* Proficiency in data analytics and business intelligence tools (Google BigQuery, Looker, AI\\-powered analytics dashboards).
* Ability to automate and optimize recruitment funnels using AI\\-dri...

title: Scientifique en vision artificielle / Computer Vision Scientist
description:
\\-\\-\\-\\-\\- ENGLISH VERSION BELOW \\-\\-\\-\\-\\-
   





 Etes\\-vous pret.e a rejoindre une startup innovante dans le domaine de la technologie medicale, dediee a l'amelioration des soins de sante ?
 



 Notre client est une entreprise logicielle qui developpe des solutions basees sur de l'IA et de vision artificielle pour rendre la chirurgie minimalement invasive, plus intelligente et securitaire. Ils revolutionnent la salle d'operation avec leur technologie de traitement d'images en temps reel. C'est un copilote du corps humain qui guide les chirurgiens avec une precision et une confiance sans precedent.
 



 Dans le but d'accelerer le developpement de leur compagnie, ils sont a la recherche de
 **deux scientifiques en vision artificielle** 
 qui joueront un role cle dans la conception, l'optimisation et la mise en uvre de modeles de vision par ordinateur avances afin de resoudre des defis complexes lies a l'analyse d'images medicales.
   





**Mode Hybride :** 
 3 jours au bureau
   





**Missions :** 



* Developpement et implementation des algorithmes de vision artificielle pour l'analyse de videos de chirurgie et d'images medicales,
* Developpement des solutions de deep learning pour la segmentation, le recalage et le SLAM a partir de donnees medicales complexes,
* Collaboration avec les equipes de R\\&D, de produit et de developpement logiciel pour integrer les modeles d'IA dans des applications cliniques,
* Analyse et validation des performances des modeles sur des ensembles de donnees reels en utilisant des criteres de precision, de robustesse et de generalisation,
* Realisation de la mise a jour continue des modeles pour ameliorer leur efficacite et leur applicabilite dans differents contextes medicaux.
* Participation a la redaction de publications scientifiques, de brevets et de rapports techniques,
* Contribution a la mise en place de normes de validation rigoureuses et a la conformite aux reglementations en matiere de dispositifs medicaux (ISO, CE, FDA, etc.).



**Profil :** 



* Diplome de Maitrise ou de Doctorat en informatique (vision par ordinateur, IA / apprentissage automatique ou profond) ou dans un domaine connexe,
* Plusieurs annees d'experience de travail en entreprise en vision par ordinateur,
* Experience de travail avec des bibliotheques de vision artificielle et de deep learning
	+ **Obligatoire** 
	 : TensorFlow
	 **OU** 
	 PyTorch
	+ OpenCV, un plus
* Expertise en traitement d'images medicales et comprehension des applications cliniques de la vision artificielle,
* Solides competences en
 **Python** 
 , et en manipulation de grandes bases de donnees d'images,
* Capacite a travailler dans un environnement multidisciplinaire et a communiquer efficacement avec des equipes techniques et non techniques.
* Comprehension du francais et connaissance de l'anglais demande



 Atouts :
 


* Experience dans la validation clinique ou la mise en uvre de produits en milieu medical,
* Connaissance des reglementations relatives aux dispositifs medicaux (par exemple, FDA, CE).
* OpenCV
* C \\+\\+

 Are you ready to join an innovative medical technology startup dedicated to improving healthcare?
 



 Our client is a software company that develops AI and computer vision\\-based solutions to make surgery minimally invasive, smarter and safer. They are revolutionizing the operating room with their real\\-time image processing technology. It's a co\\-pilot of the human body, guiding surgeons with unprecedented precision and confidence.
 



 To accelerate the development of their company, they are looking for
 **two computer vision scientists** 
 to play a key role in the design, optimization and implementation of advanced computer vision models to solve complex medical image analysis challenges.
 **Hybrid mode:** 
 3 days in the office
 



**Missions:** 



* Development and implementation of computer vision algorithms for the analysis of surgical videos and medical images,
* Development of deep learning solutions for segmentation, fusion and SLAM from complex medical data,
* Collaboration with R\\&D, product and software development teams to integrate AI models into clinical applications,

title: React Developer
description:
**React Developer
   

 12 Months Contract
   

 Montreal, QC** 
  

  

**Position Description:** 
  

 We are looking for a strong UI (React) developer to join PISA team and help deliver key initiatives. The applicant should be a solid programmer, with strong design and implementation fundamentals. Prior experience in finance or legal operations will be useful, however, the ability and willingness to quickly master new technical and business concepts will be considered. The applicant will be working with an energetic team of highly intellectual and creative developers who work on bleeding edge projects using a variety of different technologies.

 \\-At least 5\\+ years of hands\\-on web design experience with significant React experience.
   

 \\-Strong knowledge of CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and web design principles
   

 \\-An understanding of core web application design patterns, such as Model View Controller and Single
   

 \\-Page Web Applications\\-Strong design and interpretations skills, including the ability to understand business requirements and translate them into efficient and effective user interfaces.\\-Experience developing Wireframes, Storyboards, and Mockups, and working with UX teams to build

**Skill Desired:** 
  

 \\-Any experience with Web Development with Java/J2EE, Apache, Apache Tomcat back\\-end services.
   

 \\-Familiarity with Continuous Integration, Automated Testing, and modern Web Design patterns and best practices\\-RDBMS knowledge, PostgreSQL
   

 \\-Experience with Jenkins, CI, Sonar and any test automation tools like Cucumber or Selenium
   

 \\-A strong understanding of Agile/Scrum and ability to deliver solutions using TDD, BDD

 \\-Knowledge of Financial Services\\*\\*\\* is an equal opportunities employer. We work to provide a supportive and inclusive environment where all individuals can maximize their full potential.
   

  

**Description:** 
  

  

 React Developer in RIM Company Profile \\*\\*\\* is a leading global financial services firm providing a wide range of investment banking, securities, investment management and wealth management services. The Firm's employees serve clients worldwide including corporations, governments and individuals from more than 1,200 offices in 43 countries.As a market leader, the talent and passion of our people is critical to our success. Our insights, our applications and infrastructure give a competitive edge to clients' businesses's and to our own. The Risk and Information Management (RIM) organization provides IT support to the \\*\\*\\* Legal and Compliance division.
   

  

 The ideal candidate should have the skills listed below but in addition should be a self\\-driven, dedicated individual who works well in a team and thinks and acts strategically. In addition the candidate should respond well to change and quickly pick up new concepts in an ever moving regulatory landscape. When faced with a problem, the candidate should be able to ask questions and leverage the skill set of those around him/her. Daily responsibilities include, transforming requirements into code, attending scrum meetings, reporting on project status, and learning our in\\-house frameworks and UI best practices.

title: Solution Architect - AWS (Bilingual)
description:
**Why you'll love Softchoice:** 
  

 We are a software\\-focused IT solutions and services provider that equips organizations to be agile and innovative, and for their people to be engaged, connected, and creative at work. That means moving them to the cloud, helping them build the workplace of tomorrow, and enabling them to make smarter decisions about their technology. By doing these things we help them create success for their customers and their people. 
 



 We stand proudly for our people and support their success through career development and advancement. We are recognized and respected for our culture of inclusion and belonging, continuously striving to do what's good for our people and communities. 
   

  
 



**\\*Pls note, we are looking for bilingual candidates for this position \\- English \\& French** 




  
 



**The impact you will have:** 
  
 



  
 



 It has never been more critical for our customers to expand their Cloud footprint and take advantage of the latest innovations Cloud has to offer. You have an opportunity to use your creativity, consultative skills, and subject matter expertise to help our customers explore and adopt Cloud solutions that accelerate their business. 
 



  
 



 We are a technology company that equips organizations to be agile and innovative, and for their employees to be productive, creative, and happier at work. That means moving them to the cloud, helping them build the workplace of tomorrow, and enabling them to make smarter decisions about their technology portfolio. By doing these things, we create success faster and in circumstances otherwise not possible.
 



  
 



**Solution Architect, AWS** 
 is responsible for guiding our customers through their Cloud transformational journey to Amazon Web Services.  You will work with traditional datacenters, Hybrid Cloud environments, and advanced Cloud solutions. Working alongside a team of sales professionals at Softchoice, you play a vital role in architecting solutions to accelerate our customers' transition to the cloud. As an ambassador of the Softchoice brand, you will represent our value as one of North America's top solutions providers by unlocking our customers' potential. 
 



  
 



**What you'll do:** 
  
 



  
 


* Showcase your growth mindset by seeking to understand our customers' business challenges first and then designing a solution that best achieves the end goal.
* Collaborate with Professional Services engineers and other Journey Architects to develop complex solutions across multiple platforms and technologies.
* Bring people together by acting as a bridge between our sales team and our customers. Share up\\-to\\-date insights on the latest productivity solutions from Amazon.
* Formulate creative approaches to address business challenges, present and host workshops with business leaders and translate technical jargon into layman's language.


* Challenge customers by using your skills, insight, and experience to help our customers see what it takes to do the right things versus simply doing things right. Confidently challenge their beliefs with well\\-researched, tailored insights to spotlight your innovative ways of generating solutions that maximize outcomes.
* Create an excellent experience for our customers and your internal stakeholders with adaptable communications skills that foster a collaborative environment.
* Document the agreed\\-upon solution through well\\-written, thoughtful, and detailed statements of work that demonstrate your maturity, wisdom, and professionalism.



  
 



**What you'll bring to the table:** 
  
 



  
 


* Technical background with 4\\+ years of industry experience
* 3\\+ years' experience in services pre\\-sales
* You experience great delight in empowering organizations with the technology they want and need to grow their business.
* You are always curious about new technologies and how they impact our customers' business.
* You have a knack for guiding people to the right solution while making them feel it was their decision all along.
* You make people feel heard and important regardless of their rank through your inclusive communication skills, whether written or verbal. Please note that we are seeking candidates who are bilingual (French, English) for this position
* Comfortable working with engineering teams to develop solutions in the following technology areas. You are eager to learn and willing to ramp up in any areas where you may not have prior experience. 
 


	+ Data Technologies (S3, Redshift, DynamoDB, Glue, Kinesis, EMR)
* + AI and Machine Learning Technologies (SageMaker, Comprehend, Rekognition, Polly, Lex)
* + Cloud and Infrastructure 
	 
	
	
		- Landing Zone with Control Tower
		- Migrations
		- App Modernization
		- Business transformation concepts and strategies
		- Cloud security
		- Governance
		- General computing concepts (IaaS and PaaS)
		- Development \\& DevOps concept
		- Traditional datacenter computing (conceptual knowledge)
		- Formal sales training or Account Management experience is an asset
		- Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience preferred.



  

**Not sure if you qualify? Think about applying anyway:** 
  

 We understand that not everyone brings 100% of the skills and experience for the role.
 



 At Softchoice, we offer opportunities to a diverse group including those with a variety of workplace experiences and backgrounds.  Whether you are new to corporate tech, returning to work after a gap in employment, or looking to transition and take the next step in your career, we are excited to learn more about you and encourage you to apply.  
 



  
 



**Why You'll Love Working Here:** 



* **The People:** 
 You'll thrive in our collaborative environment, surrounded by incredible colleagues who foster support and innovation, driving our collective success
* **High\\-Performing Culture:** 
 At Softchoice, we are dedicated to achieving our goals and committed to success for our customers and each other
* **Flexibility:** 
 Plan your workdays in a way that suits you best
* **Award\\-Winning Workplace:** 
 Proudly recognized as a Great Place to Work for 19 consecutive years
* **Inclusive Culture:** 
 We are committed to an inclusive culture where every team member can be their authentic self
* **Competitive Benefits:** 
 Benefit from competitive perks that start on day one



  

**Inclusion \\& Equal opportunity employment:** 
  

 We are an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity, inclusion \\& belonging. People seeking employment at Softchoice are considered without regard to any protected category including but not limited to, race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, disability, veteran status, gender identity, or sexual orientation.
   

  

**Require accommodation? We are ready to help:** 
  

 We are proud to provide interview \\& employment accommodation during the recruitment and hiring process. If you require any accommodation to apply or interview for a position, please reach out directly to asktalentacquisition@softchoice.com. We are committed to working with you to best meet your needs.
   

  

**Our commitment to your experience:** 
  

 We are committed to the safety of all applicants and team members. With that in mind, we have implemented digital interviewing for everyone. We understand that you may need to interview with distractions around you (such as children or furry friends) and we will be doing the same.
   

  

 Before you start with us, we will conduct a criminal record check, verify your education, and check your references.
   

  

 When you join Softchoice, we will onboard you remotely. Don't worry. It's quick, simple and you'll be connected with your new team in no time.

title: Actuarial Analyst - Co-op/ 4-month Internship (Fall 2025 and Winter 2026)*
description:
*Our employees are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we help people, businesses, and society prosper in good times and be resilient in bad times.* 




  

*Our employee promise represents Intact's commitment to you in exchange for living our Values, striving to do your best work, being open to change and investing in your career. In return, we promise to provide support, opportunities and performance\\-led financial rewards at a workplace where you can shape the future, win as a team and grow with us.* 
  









**About the role** 











**Recruitment Session: Fall 2025 and Winter 2026\\*** 




 Starting your career at Intact means joining a diverse community of experts who value your skills in a constantly evolving industry. Here, you will receive guidance in a dynamic environment where the work is tangible. You will innovate and drive our organization forward, benefiting clients and communities. You will grow both personally and professionally through cutting\\-edge learning platforms and develop lasting connections throughout the organization. Above all, you will see how stimulating the working world can be.
 



 Here, your career can take off 🚀
 



 We are currently looking for an Actuarial Analyst Intern to join our growing team!
